question: who does eric end up with in gossip girl
chain_of_thought_result: In the series "Gossip Girl," Eric van der Woodsen, played by Connor Paolo, ultimately ends up with no specific romantic partner by the end of the show. Throughout the series, Eric has various relationships, but his character's storyline focuses more on his personal growth and family dynamics rather than a central romantic relationship. By the end of the series, he is seen as a supportive brother to Serena and has established a sense of independence.
